description:
EquiAnalgesia is the first webOS Opiod pain medicine conversion calculator.  It is intended for prescribers, only.   Also, look for EquiSteroidia soon. 
v1.20 minor fixes to make more legible on the Pre3, and easier to develop Equisteroidia.  Also changed support website due to changes at PreCentral.net (now webosnation.com) where the Medical apps forum was discontinued, so I've applied for my own Developer sub-forum. )
v1.1.1 fixes support email and web links and some Calculator formatting is better.  Unfortunately, it only runs in "compatibility mode" on TouchPad (not full-screen).  

Unlike the Touchpad emulator screenshots, the actual app runs "right side up" in whatever your Touchpad orientation is.  (Tested on my Touchpad).
